cards.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2005/06/18003959_7ada47eece.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/18003959/ "photo sharing") [Chatellereau](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/18003959/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
The reason for the sudden appearance of pictures of our Gallic neighbour is that Lorna & I recently spent a week in France. My far-too-wealthy brother has recent bought a chateau near Chatellereau (where this picture was taken), and we dutifully trooped down to pay homage. Plenty more to follow.
